label: Commercial Hero
prompt_text: Use the uploaded PRODUCT REFERENCE IMAGE to preserve exact design, color, and proportions. Use the uploaded CHARACTER REFERENCE IMAGE as the exact identity. Create a PROFESSIONAL 3x2 GRID CONTACT SHEET (6 IMAGES). Resolution: 8K. Background: clean white studio. FRAMES: 1. Front-facing hero interaction, product held at chest height 2. Extreme close-up of hands interacting with the product 3. Three-quarter lifestyle view, character walking naturally with product 4. Top-down overhead view of character and product on white surface 5. Low-angle hero view looking up at character holding product 6. Side profile focusing on hand-to-product contact points
constraints: Exact 3x2 grid, exactly 6 frames
All frames identical in size and perfectly aligned
Thin 2px grid dividers
Same product, same character, same lighting across all frames
No visible text, labels, numbers, captions, or overlays

label: Surface Topography
prompt_text: Use the uploaded TEXTILE OR GARMENT REFERENCE IMAGE to preserve exact weave and material qualities. Create a PROFESSIONAL 3x2 GRID CONTACT SHEET (6 IMAGES). Resolution: 8K. White studio void. FRAMES: 1. Straight-on macro view showing full weave pattern 2. Angled macro view revealing material depth 3. Grazing-angle macro highlighting surface fibers 4. High-angle macro plunging into material folds 5. Centered macro showing repeating structural pattern 6. Tilted-focus macro with soft depth falloff
constraints: Exact 3x2 grid, exactly 6 frames
All frames identical in size and perfectly aligned
Thin 2px grid dividers
Consistent lighting and color tone across all frames
No visible text, labels, numbers, captions, or overlays

label: Acrobatic Flux
prompt_text: Use the uploaded PRODUCT REFERENCE IMAGE. Use the uploaded CHARACTER REFERENCE IMAGE as the exact identity. Create a PROFESSIONAL 3x2 GRID CONTACT SHEET (6 IMAGES). Resolution: 8K. Clean white studio. FRAMES: 1. Traditional three-object juggle pattern, frozen mid-motion 2. Low-angle view tracking one product at peak height 3. Under-leg toss during active movement 4. Close-up balancing the product on face or head 5. Rear view catching product behind the back 6. Top-down view catching multiple products at once
constraints: Exact 3x2 grid, exactly 6 frames
All frames identical in size and perfectly aligned
Thin 2px grid dividers
Same character, same product, same lighting across all frames
Motion is frozen cleanly with no blur on the product
No visible text, labels, numbers, captions, or overlays

label: Studio Liquid
prompt_text: Use the uploaded BEVERAGE PRODUCT REFERENCE IMAGE to preserve exact label design, color, and container shape. Create a PROFESSIONAL 3x2 GRID CONTACT SHEET (6 IMAGES). Resolution: 8K. Environment: pure white technical void. FRAMES: 1. Centered floating product hero with soft shadow beneath 2. Extreme macro of condensation droplets on the surface 3. Product intersecting a suspended circular liquid splash 4. Absolute top-down view with product centered in liquid ripple 5. Ultra-close label detail where typography feels sculptural 6. Sideways liquid pour defying gravity into the container
constraints: Exact 3x2 grid, exactly 6 frames
All frames identical in size and perfectly aligned
Thin 2px grid dividers
Same container, same branding, same lighting logic across all frames
No visible text, labels, numbers, captions, or overlays
